titleStmt.title: The honorable victorie obteined by graue Maurice his Excellencie, against the cittie of Rhyne-berg, the 20. of August. 1597 Translated out of the Dutch coppie, printed in S. Grauenhaghe, by Albert Hendrickson.
titleStmt.author: Hendricks, Albert.
Maurice, Prince of Orange, 1567-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Edward Allde for Thomas Stirrop: and are to be sold at his shop in Paules Church yard at the signe the [sic] George[,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Graue Maurice his victorie against the enemies in Rhine-berg.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Paules Church yard at the signe the [sic] George[
